channel.title: Models :: Rik's Treehouse
channel.description: I’m interested in the patterns that can emerge when many (often simple) elements interact. It is often required to build models of these kinds of systems to study their behaviour.

item.title: Conway's Game of Life (2020)
item.author: rik.blok@ubc.ca (Rik Blok)
item.description: This NetLogo model implements Conway’s Game of Life, a cellular automaton John Horton Conway designed to be difficult to anticipate the dynamics of starting patterns. This implementation incorporates some ideas I focused on in my research: finite-size effects and asynchronous updating.
